Links

Youtube Video
-----------------

|   http://www.youtube.com/user/TheBlackjack304

Note: Please search for the video named: ``Network Management`` on above channel.

-------------
Libraries
-------------

|    1. pycap library for packet parsing
|       http://pycap.sourceforge.net/

---------------
Useful Links
---------------

|   1. Munin Monitoring Tools 
|   http://munin-monitoring.org/

|   2. AirPort Extreme Mib: Information 
|   http://support.apple.com/kb/DL1186

|   3. Python getopt
|   http://docs.python.org/library/getopt.html

|   4. Documentation
|   http://sphinx.pocoo.org/rest.html

|   4. Munin QuickStart Tutorial
|   http://waste.mandragor.org/munin_tutorial/munin.html#getting_started
